casebody.data:
(Republished)

In the Matter of the Intermediate Accounting of Gerald FitzGerald, as Trustee under the Will of Alexander Morten, Deceased. In the Matter of the Accounting of Marjory Morten, as Trustee under the Will of Alexander Morten, Deceased. Marjory Morten, Appellant; Gerald FitzGerald et al., Respondents.

Decree unanimously modified on the facts and in the exercise of discretion so as to provide in the 7th decretal paragraph for an increase to $36,000 per year, and as modified is otherwise affirmed. Costs to all parties filing briefs payable out of the trust estate. Settle order. Concur — Breitel, J. P., M. M. Frank, Valente, McNally and Bergan, JJ. [See ante, p. 865.]
